title: Software Engineer
description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications. Work with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.
requirements:
- 3+ years of software development experience
- Proficiency in at least one programming language (Python, JavaScript, Java, etc.)
- Experience with version control (Git)
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication abilities
educationLevel: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Lead technical initiatives and mentor junior engineers. Design scalable systems and drive engineering best practices.
requirements:
- 5+ years of software development experience
- Experience leading technical projects
- Strong system design skills
- Mentorship experience
- Track record of delivering complex features
educationLevel: Bachelor's in Computer Science or related field

title: HR Coordinator
description: Support HR operations including recruiting, onboarding, and employee relations. Maintain HR systems and documentation.
requirements:
- 1+ years HR experience
- Knowledge of HR policies and procedures
- Strong organizational skills
- Proficiency with HRIS systems
- Excellent interpersonal skills
educationLevel: Bachelor's in Human Resources, Business, or related field

title: Marketing Manager
description: Develop and execute marketing strategies. Manage campaigns across digital and traditional channels. Analyze performance and optimize ROI.
requirements:
- 4+ years marketing experience
- Experience with digital marketing channels
- Data-driven decision making
- Budget management
- Team leadership
educationLevel: Bachelor's in Marketing, Communications, or related field

title: Account Executive
description: Drive revenue by acquiring new customers and expanding existing accounts. Manage full sales cycle from prospecting to close.
requirements:
- 2+ years B2B sales experience
- Track record of meeting quotas
- CRM proficiency (Salesforce preferred)
- Strong presentation skills
- Hunter mentality

title: Customer Success Manager
description: Ensure customer satisfaction and retention. Onboard new customers, drive adoption, and identify expansion opportunities.
requirements:
- 2+ years customer success or account management
- Strong customer empathy
- Data analysis skills
- Project management abilities
- Technical aptitude

title: Operations Analyst
description: Analyze business processes and identify improvement opportunities. Create reports, track KPIs, and support operational decision-making.
requirements:
- 1+ years operations or analytics experience
- Strong Excel/spreadsheet skills
- SQL knowledge preferred
- Process improvement mindset
- Attention to detail
educationLevel: Bachelor's in Business, Analytics, or related field

title: Financial Analyst
description: Support financial planning and analysis. Create forecasts, analyze variances, and provide insights to leadership.
requirements:
- 2+ years financial analysis experience
- Advanced Excel and financial modeling
- Experience with financial systems (NetSuite, SAP)
- Strong analytical skills
- CPA or CFA preferred
educationLevel: Bachelor's in Finance, Accounting, or related field
